data.message: Dear facebook, i've recieve a message from my friends the message said that if i did not share the message i recieve to my 25 friends my account is automatically deleted within 2 weeks if i didn't share it. The message said that because of overpopulated the facebook team wants to know if i am active they said i need to send it to 25 person so that the facebook team will know my account is active. is that true? thanks i want to know
